Omnichannel AI chatbot enhancing custome: Omnichannel AI 聊天机器人增强客户在 WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram, Telegram 和 6 个其他平台的交互。
\n To obtain your Fliqr API access:
To obtain your Fliqr API access token, follow these steps:

      1. Log in to your Fliqr account.
      2. Navigate to Fliqr API Access Token Settings.
      3. Under the Integrations section, find the Fliqr API Access Token.
      4. Click on Copy Token to copy your existing token or click on Generate Token to create a new one.
      5. Copy the token and paste it below in "Fliqr API Access Token".
Get Business Account details: 获取商业帐户详细信息
Get basic account details of business: 获取商业的基本帐户详细信息
Make a custom API call to a specific end: 将一个自定义 API 调用到一个特定的终点
Authorization headers are injected autom: 授权头自动从您的连接中注入。
